channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-35446] FileMergingSnapshotManagerBase throws a NullPointerException
item.description:
• 1.20 Java 11 / Test (module: tests) https://github.com/apache/flink/actions/runs/9217608897/job/25360103124#step:10:8641

ResumeCheckpointManuallyITCase.testExternalizedIncrementalRocksDBCheckpointsWithLocalRecoveryZookeeper throws a NullPointerException when it tries to restore state handles:

This looks like a similar error that happened in FLINK-35382, but for a different reason.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

lijinzhong or zakelly Do you think this needs a similar fix as FLINK-35382 ?
rskraba Thanks for letting me know! I'll fix this.

Thanks for the fix! There were a bunch of failures over the weekend before the merge to master:

I'll keep eye on the following builds.
